title: New Heavily Armed Police Set To Patrol Sydney Streets To Prevent Hate Crimes | 10 News
description: There will soon be more heavily armed police patrolling Sydney's streets around the clock, all part of a new policing unit dedicated to rapidly responding to potential hate-related threats and incidents. The premier says it's a big change but necessary in the wake of the Bondi attack, although questions remain over exactly how much it will cost.
